description: This table contains information about questionnaire answers for the associated screening form.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the timeout record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SCRFORM_ANSWER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the questionnaire answers recorded in the screening form.

columns.name: SCRFORM_QUESR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the questionnaire record in the screening form.

columns.name: SCRFORM_QUESR_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: SCRFORM_REVD_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The last instant the questionnaire answers were reviewed in the screening form.
